H0.text: Who did Johnnie Cochran defend in a famous 1990s trial. Robert Blake

H1.text: Who did Johnnie Cochran defend in a famous 1990s trial. Michael Jackson

H2.text: Who did Johnnie Cochran defend in a famous 1990s trial. Rodney King

H3.text: Who did Johnnie Cochran defend in a famous 1990s trial. Orenthal

A4.text: Simpson hired a team of high-profile defense lawyers, initially led by Robert Shapiro, who was previously a civil lawyer known for settling, and then subsequently by Johnnie Cochran, who at that point was known for police brutality and civil rights cases.
